page.title: 07CARDROSS _ RECREATION
page.content: {SPORTING ACTIVITIES}ARE AVAILABLE IN THE VILLAGE, BUT MOSTLY OUTSIDE OUR BLOCK. THERE IS GOLF, TENNIS, BOWLS, BADMINTON, DARTS, AND BRIDGE. PART OF THE GOLF COURSE IS ON OUR PATCH. {LIBRARY}IS ALSO SITUATED IN THE ADJACENT BLOCK, BUT IS WIDLY USED BY THE VILLAGERS. IT IS OPEN 4 DAYS A WEEK ON A PART TIME BASIS. {WALKING}IS A POPULAR PASTIME, ESPECIALLY FOR THOSE WITH DOGS. THERE ARE MANY PICTURESQUE WALKS TO ENJOY. {GARDENING}KEEPS MANY PEOPLE BUSY AND HAPPY AS CAN BE SEEN BY THE PASSER BY. {TELEVISION AND VIDEO RECORDERS}PROVIDE SEDENTARY ENTERTAINMENT. A VAN COMES ONCE A WEEK TO HIRE OUT VIDEO TAPES. SOME T.V. AND VIDEO RECORDERS ARE BOUGHT BUT THE MAJORITY ARE HIRED FROM RENTAL COMPANIES.
